attributes.action: Force the government to call a referendum on re-joining the European-Union
attributes.additional_details: Almost 10 years ago, In 2016, the public voted to leave the European-Union. Today however public opinion has completely turned on Brexit with many polls stating that the number of people supporting the UK re-joining the EU outnumbering people who wish to stay out almost by 2 to 1. Not to mention many analysts have stated the Economic disaster that is Brexit has caused with many stating that it costs our economy almost £2Bn per week. Many people are fed up with Brexit and want the EU again.
attributes.background: Call a referendum and give us, the people ,the chance to vote on the UK re-joining the European-Union by applying to re-join under Article 49 of the Treaty on European Union

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Commit to a referendum in May 2028 asking the next government to rejoin the EU
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747385
